text: "In the Closet" is a song by American singer-songwriter Michael Jackson from his 1991 album Dangerous. The track features a blend of pop and R&B;, and it explores themes of secrecy and hidden love. The song is notable for its infectious beat and Jackson's distinctive vocal style, as well as its production by Jackson and Teddy Riley, who was instrumental in the development of the new jack swing genre. == Music video == The music video for "In the Closet" includes visually striking imagery and features supermodel Naomi Campbell. The video emphasizes the song's themes of desire and intimacy. The song received generally positive reviews from critics and has been appreciated for its production and lyrical content.
title: In the Closet
